name: Eigen Network
intro: Programmable privacy layer for EVM-compatible ecosystem
introduce: Eigen Network aims to facilitate a programmable privacy layer for every Web3 participant in EVM-compatible ecosystem by zk-zkVM. Eigen ZKZRU is a new ZK-ZKRollup protocol to achieve address anonymity, smart contract data and logic confidentiality. Eigen Secret is a decentralized asset managermet platform, which provides keyless signing and social recovery regarding to cross-device, multi-parties collabration and fine-grained payment over Web3.
